channel.title: Feathers
channel.description:
Feathers is a game of angels, fallen into our world, wandering in unfamiliar, fragile bodies, looking for a people, places, and selves they can fnd comfort in. It’s about being divine inside, and learning to own and love what’s on the outside. It’s about the connections that keep us warm, and how we become the people we want to be. Heaven is lost to them, never to return, but there are undreamed of joys and tragedies to be found among the flock here below.
In case it isn’t clear: this game is deeply queer, and is a pretty transparent metaphor for being transgender. You’re not here to wallow in misery, even though the characters are likely to hurt and get hurt along the way. This story, just like ours, is ultimately an optimistic one.
![2f3be6dfb7796dab06347a04e9512a9d|312x500](upload://23EzG8szZMw5Mft559uqzMe5KLg.jpeg)
*I am saving a seat for David Morrison.*
**Content Warning:** themes of dysphoria, implied self-harm, unhealthy relationship dynamics **System** : Belonging Outside Belonging **Duration** : Two 3 1/2-hour sessions **Breaks** : Two 5-10 minute breaks, as required **Venue** : Facilitator's Zoom **Recording** : Yes, but made public only with all players' enthusiastic consent! **Attendance** : **Please only RSVP if you can do so for both sessions.** **Safety** : Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door Policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MTwaQR9x1ATibYKNLec) [date=2021-04-17 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-04-17 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MTwagLZb0hFLSjwqDWt) [date=2021-04-24 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-04-24 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
RSVPs open to all from 22nd February 11pm (GMT)

item.title: Feathers
item.dc:creator: @Donogh
item.description:
@Donogh wrote:

Feathers is a game of angels, fallen into our world, wandering in unfamiliar, fragile bodies, looking for a people, places, and selves they can fnd comfort in. It’s about being divine inside, and learning to own and love what’s on the outside. It’s about the connections that keep us warm, and how we become the people we want to be. Heaven is lost to them, never to return, but there are undreamed of joys and tragedies to be found among the flock here below.

In case it isn’t clear: this game is deeply queer, and is a pretty transparent metaphor for being transgender. You’re not here to wallow in misery, even though the characters are likely to hurt and get hurt along the way. This story, just like ours, is ultimately an optimistic one.

2f3be6dfb7796dab06347a04e9512a9d344×550 43.7 KB

I am saving a seat for David Morrison.

Content Warning: themes of dysphoria, implied self-harm, unhealthy relationship dynamics
System : Belonging Outside Belonging
Duration : Two 3 1/2-hour sessions
Breaks : Two 5-10 minute breaks, as required
Venue : Facilitator’s Zoom
Recording : Yes, but made public only with all players’ enthusiastic consent!
Attendance : Please only RSVP if you can do so for both sessions.
Safety : Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door Policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.

Session 1 2021-04-17T19:00:00Z → 2021-04-17T22:30:00Z
Session 2 2021-04-24T19:00:00Z → 2021-04-24T22:30:00Z

RSVPs open to all from 22nd February 11pm (GMT)
